name: alfuix
description: alfuix â€” A futuristic, modular SCSS + JS UI framework that extends popular frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind with advanced utilities, motion effects, and clipping-based design for next-generation web experiences.
author: The Alif Lab & alfuix (https://github.com/alifislamidawah/alfuix/graphs/contributors)

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: npx mkdirp dist/css dist/js && npm run css:build && npm run js:build && npm run add:banners
scripts.css:build: npm run css:normal && npm run css:minify
scripts.css:normal: npx sass scss/alfuix.scss dist/css/alfuix.css --style=expanded && npx sass scss/alfuix-clip.scss dist/css/alfuix-clip.css --style=expanded && npx sass scss/alfuix-animation.scss dist/css/alfuix-animation.css --style=expanded && npx sass scss/alfuix-utilities.scss dist/css/alfuix-utilities.css --style=expanded
scripts.css:minify: npx sass scss/alfuix.scss dist/css/alfuix.min.css --style=compressed && npx sass scss/alfuix-clip.scss dist/css/alfuix-clip.min.css --style=compressed && npx sass scss/alfuix-animation.scss dist/css/alfuix-animation.min.css --style=compressed && npx sass scss/alfuix-utilities.scss dist/css/alfuix-utilities.min.css --style=compressed
scripts.js:build: npm run js:copy && npm run js:bundle && npm run js:minify
scripts.js:copy: npx mkdirp dist/js && npx copyfiles -f js/alfuix.js js/alfuix-animation.js dist/js
scripts.js:minify: npx terser dist/js/alfuix.js -o dist/js/alfuix.min.js --compress --mangle --comments '/^!/' && npx terser dist/js/alfuix-animation.js -o dist/js/alfuix-animation.min.js --compress --mangle --comments '/^!/' && npx terser dist/js/alfuix.bundle.js -o dist/js/alfuix.bundle.min.js --compress --mangle --comments '/^!/'
